title: Epic 0: Baseline Measurement and Infrastructure
description:
Establish performance baselines and verify prerequisites before optimization work begins. This epic is CRITICAL - all future optimization claims depend on these baseline measurements.

**Goal**: Measure current performance for Morton encoding, ray traversal, contour memory, and rendering to establish baselines for Epic 1-4 optimizations.

**Reference**: Memory Bank: Luciferase_ESVO_Optimization/epic0_implementation_bead.md
**ChromaDB**: esvo_epic0_baseline, esvo_epic0_implementation_bead_complete

**Timeline**: 7 days (4 phases)
**Sub-beads**: 4 (0.1-0.4)

**Success Criteria**:
- All baseline metrics documented in PERFORMANCE_METRICS_MASTER.md
- GPU framework operational
- Standard datasets generated
- Prerequisites verified (contours, JMH, GPU)

title: Phase 1: Critical Verification - Contours, JMH, GPU
description:
**CRITICAL FIRST ACTIONS** - Must complete before other beads

**Tasks**:
1. Verify contours exist (BLOCKER for Epic 3)
   - Search: find render/src/main/java -name '*Contour*.java'
   - Check ESVO_COMPLETION_SUMMARY.md
   - Search esvo_ray_traversal.cl for contour code
   - Document: EXIST or NOT EXIST

2. Verify JMH configured
   - Check: grep -A5 'jmh' lucien/pom.xml
   - Ensure performance profile exists
   - Add if missing

3. Test GPU access
   - Run: mvn test -Dtest=GPUDeviceDetectorTest -pl lucien -DargLine='-DdangerouslyDisableSandbox=true'
   - Confirm GPU enumeration works

**Deliverables**:
- Contour verification documented (blocks Epic 3 if missing)
- JMH confirmed working
- GPU access confirmed

**Reference**: Epic 0 Implementation Bead - Phase 1
**Timeline**: Day 1

title: Phase 4: Documentation and Knowledge Integration
description:
Final documentation and knowledge integration after all benchmarks complete

**Tasks**:
1. Update PERFORMANCE_METRICS_MASTER.md with baseline section
   - Morton encoding: XXX ops/sec
   - Ray traversal: XXX nodes/ray
   - Contour memory: X bytes/normal (if applicable)
   - Rendering: XX fps at various dataset sizes

2. Create 7 ChromaDB documents:
   - esvo_epic0_bead0.1_morton_baseline
   - esvo_epic0_bead0.1_traversal_baseline
   - esvo_epic0_bead0.1_contour_baseline (if applicable)
   - esvo_epic0_bead0.1_rendering_baseline
   - esvo_epic0_bead0.2_gpu_framework
   - esvo_epic0_bead0.3_gpu_matrix
   - esvo_epic0_bead0.4_datasets

3. Create 5 Memory Bank files:
   - epic0_bead0.1_implementation.md
   - epic0_bead0.2_gpu_framework.md
   - epic0_bead0.3_gpu_matrix.md
   - epic0_bead0.4_datasets.md
   - epic0_results.md (consolidated)

4. Update GPU_COMPATIBILITY_MATRIX.md with test results

**Dependencies**: All beads complete (0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.4)
**Timeline**: Days 6-7
**Reference**: Epic 0 Implementation Bead - Phase 4

title: Bead 0.1: Measure Current Performance Metrics
description:
Create 4 JMH benchmarks to establish baselines for Epic 1-4

**Benchmarks to Create**:
1. MortonEncodingBaselineBenchmark.java (Epic 1 baseline)
   - Measure: encodeMorton() ops/sec
   - Location: lucien/src/test/java/.../benchmark/baseline/
   - Target: 2-4x speedup with SIMD

2. RayTraversalBaselineBenchmark.java (Epic 2 baseline)
   - Measure: average nodes visited per ray
   - Need: Datasets from Bead 0.4
   - Target: 30-50% reduction with beam optimization

3. ContourMemoryBaselineBenchmark.java (Epic 3 baseline - CONDITIONAL)
   - Measure: bytes per contour normal
   - Depends: Contour verification from Phase 1
   - Skip if contours don't exist

4. RenderingPerformanceBaselineBenchmark.java (Epic 4 baseline)
   - Measure: FPS with various dataset sizes
   - Requires: dangerouslyDisableSandbox=true
   - Need: Datasets from Bead 0.4

**Files**: lucien/src/test/java/.../benchmark/baseline/ (4 benchmarks)
**Timeline**: Days 4-5
**Reference**: Epic 0 Implementation Bead - Bead 0.1

title: Bead 0.4: Establish Baseline Dataset Library
description:
Generate standard reproducible datasets for benchmarking

**Generator**: DatasetGenerator.java (lucien/src/test/java/.../benchmark/)

**Datasets to Generate**:
1. small_sparse_10.oct (1024³, 10%, seed=12345, ~100MB)
2. small_sparse_50.oct (1024³, 50%, seed=12345, ~500MB)
3. medium_sparse_10.oct (2048³, 10%, seed=67890, ~800MB)
4. medium_sparse_50.oct (2048³, 50%, seed=67890, ~4GB)
5. large_sparse_10.oct (4096³, 10%, seed=11111, ~6.4GB) - DEFER to Epic 4

**Location**: lucien/src/test/resources/datasets/baseline/

**Features**:
- Seeded random for reproducibility
- ESVO .oct format
- Varied sparsity levels

**Timeline**: Days 2-3 (parallel with Bead 0.2)
**Reference**: Epic 0 Implementation Bead - Bead 0.4

title: Bead 0.3: Document GPU Vendor Compatibility Matrix
description:
Create GPU compatibility tracking document

**File**: lucien/doc/GPU_COMPATIBILITY_MATRIX.md

**Content**:

- Requirements by epic

**Format**: Markdown with status indicators

- ⚠️ Partial Support
- ❌ Not Working
- ⚪ Not Tested

**Dependencies**: Bead 0.2 (needs GPU detection working)
**Timeline**: Day 3
**Reference**: Epic 0 Implementation Bead - Bead 0.3

title: Bead 0.2: Create GPU Compatibility Test Framework
description:
Create infrastructure to detect and test GPU devices across vendors

**Classes to Create**:
1. GPUDeviceDetector.java - Enumerate GPUs via LWJGL OpenCL
2. GPUCapabilityReporter.java - Report GPU specs
3. GPUBenchmarkRunner.java - Run GPU benchmarks
4. GPUTestFramework.java - Framework coordinator

**Location**: lucien/src/test/java/.../gpu/
**Requires**: dangerouslyDisableSandbox=true for all GPU tests

**Deliverables**:
- GPU enumeration working
- At least 1 GPU detected and documented
- Framework ready for Epic 3-5

**Timeline**: Days 2-3 (parallel with Bead 0.4)
**Reference**: Epic 0 Implementation Bead - Bead 0.2
